tool_description: Ebay product search API provides programmatic access to the search capabilities on the eBay platform. It lets you search and browse for products listed on eBay, and provides useful metadata to refine searches and enhance the search experience. You can search sold items data, min and max bid count, min and max price range, search under categories and sub categories. You name it and this API has all detailed information about a product in it.
name: Ebay Product Search
title: Ebay Product Search

api_list.name: Product Category Lookup
api_list.description: Get the ebay store category by category name or category id.  This method will return all the top level categories list if called without any input parameter otherwise the requested category and all its sub categories (if available) will get returned in the response

optional_parameters.name: category_name_or_id
optional_parameters.description: Category name or id.

api_list.name: Product Detail
api_list.description: Get product detail from eBay store

api_list.name: Product Search
api_list.description:
This method searches for eBay items by different query parameters and retrieves details of the items.
You can search by keyword, category, GTIN, EPID or a combination of these.

Only listings where “Buy It Now” is a buying option are returned by default.  To retrieve listings other than Buy It Now, please select IncludeAuctions, IncludeNegotiablePrice etc filters.

This method also supports the following:

Filtering by the value of one or multiple fields, such as item condition, price range, location, and more.  The results are paginated, maximum 10 results per request will get returned.  Results can be sorted by Sort query parameters. By default, the results are sorted by Best Match.

optional_parameters.name: LastSoldWithinDays
optional_parameters.description: This field is used to narrow down all results for the listing that are sold recently in past x number of days.

optional_parameters.name: IncludeCharityOnly
optional_parameters.description:
If you set this field to true it would include listings that are associated with a charity only, 
in the search results, on the other hand if you select it false no charity listings would be selected.

optional_parameters.name: BidCountMin
optional_parameters.description:
This field would indicate the minimum bid count for all the results. 
If the Bid count on the listing would be more than or equal to this number it would show as a result.

optional_parameters.name: DeliveryCountryCode
optional_parameters.description:
This field indicates the location to deliver the products listed. 
This narrows down the search criteria if you only want products that can be delivered to certain countries. 
It also helps to decide GuaranteedDeliveryDays.

optional_parameters.name: GTIN
optional_parameters.description:
This field lets you search by the Global Trade Item Number of the item as defined by 
<see href=\"https://www.gtin.info\">https://www.gtin.info</see>.
You can search only by UPC (Universal Product Code).

optional_parameters.name: ExcludedCategoryIds
optional_parameters.description:
If you list any categoryIds in this field, you would get resulted listings that would exclude 
category listings, and would show everything else according to other criteria in search parameters. 
You can list category Ids separated by commas.

optional_parameters.name: ItemLocationCountryCode
optional_parameters.description:
This field indicates the location of the products listed. 
This narrows down the search criteria if you only want products from certain countries.

optional_parameters.name: IncludeNegotiablePrice
optional_parameters.description:
If you set this field to true it would include listings with best offer negotiation 
option in the search results, on the other hand if you select it false no listings with best offer option would be selected.

optional_parameters.name: SubCondition
optional_parameters.description: This field can be used to select the condition of the items in listings to narrow down results,

optional_parameters.name: PerformNonStrictSearch
optional_parameters.description:
When this field is true all words in the keyword would be matched in the listing 
If PerformNonStrictSearch is false then any combination of the search term would generate a result.

optional_parameters.name: IncludeAuction
optional_parameters.description:
If you set this field to true it would include Actions in the search results, 
on the other hand if you select it false no auctions would be selected.

optional_parameters.name: IncludeBuyItNow
optional_parameters.description: By default all search results show BuyItNow listings but if you select false, Fixed price listings would not show.

optional_parameters.name: IncludeCreditCardPaymentOnly
optional_parameters.description:
This field when true narrows down the search results to only include 
listings with credit card option as the payment option. If it is false it includes 
listings with credit card as well as Payal or other payment methods as payment option.

optional_parameters.name: ExcludedSellers
optional_parameters.description:
If you list any sellers in this field, you would get resulted listings that would exclude 
those seller listings, and would show everything else according to other criteria in search parameters. 
You can list sellers separated by commas.

optional_parameters.name: IncludeFreeShippingOnly
optional_parameters.description:
This field when true narrows down the search results to only include listings with free shipping option. 
If it is false it includes free as well as charged shipping option both.

optional_parameters.name: BidCountMax
optional_parameters.description:
This field would indicate the maximum bid count for all the results. 
If the Bid count on the listing would be less than or equal to this number it would show as a result.

optional_parameters.name: IncludePromotedListingOnly
optional_parameters.description:
If you set this field to true it would include promoted listings in the search results, 
on the other hand if you select it false no promoted listings would be selected.

optional_parameters.name: DeliveryPostalCode
optional_parameters.description:
This field indicates the location postal code to deliver the products listed. 
This narrows down the search criteria if you only want products that can be delivered to certain cities. 
It also helps to decide GuaranteedDeliveryDays.

optional_parameters.name: GuaranteedDeliveryInDays
optional_parameters.description:
This field is to narrow down search results if there is a guaranteed delivery days option in place. 
DeliveryCountryCode and DeliveryPostalCode must be supplied by this option.

optional_parameters.name: Sellers
optional_parameters.description:
If you list any sellers in this field, you would get resulted listings for 
that seller only.You can list sellers separated by commas.

optional_parameters.name: PageNumber
optional_parameters.description:
This search field is using pagination. Each page has 10 results, so by giving page number 
in this field you would get next 10 listings on the specified page, 
by skipping the offset by that number.

optional_parameters.name: MinPrice
optional_parameters.description:
This field would indicate the minimum price for all the results. 
If the price of the listing would be more than or equal to this number it would show as a result.

optional_parameters.name: IncludeReturnableOnly
optional_parameters.description:
This field when true narrows down the search results to only include listings with return option. 
If it is false it includes listings with returnable or non returnable products.

optional_parameters.name: EPID
optional_parameters.description: The ePID is the eBay product identifier of a product from the eBay product catalog.

optional_parameters.name: Sort
optional_parameters.description:
The order and field name that is used to sort the items. 
You can sort items by price, distance, or listing date. 
To sort in descending order, insert a hyphen before the name of the sorting option.

optional_parameters.name: MaxPrice
optional_parameters.description:
This field would indicate the maximum price for all the results. 
If the price of the listing would be less than or equal to this number it would show as a result.

optional_parameters.name: Keyword
optional_parameters.description: A string consisting of one or more keywords that are used to search for items on eBay

optional_parameters.name: IncludeClassifiedAds
optional_parameters.description:
If you set this field to true it would include classified Ads listings in the search results, 
on the other hand if you select it false no classified listings would be selected.

optional_parameters.name: CharityIds
optional_parameters.description:
This field can have one charity ID or a comma separated list of IDs. The method will return all the items associated with the specified charities. 
Look up for charities that eBay supports at https://charity.ebay.com. EIN number on charity page is the Charity Id.

optional_parameters.name: Condition
optional_parameters.description: This field can be used to select the condition of the items in listings to narrow down results,

optional_parameters.name: CategoryId
optional_parameters.description: The method will limit and return all the items associated with the specified category.
